## {#jump-around-lines data-menu-title="Jump around lines"}

<div class = slide-title>`r fontawesome::fa("step-forward", fill = "#05859B", a11y = "sem")` Jump to the beginning/end of lines</div>

::: {.panel-tabset}
## `r fontawesome::fa("apple", fill = "#053660", a11y = "sem")` Mac
:::: {.columns}
::: {.column width="50%"}
<br>
<iframe width="550" height="290" src="media/mp4/jump_beginning_end.mp4" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>
:::
::: {.column width="50%"}
<br>

<div class = body-text>`r fontawesome::fa("angle-right", fill = "#05859B", a11y = "sem")` Jump one word at a time `option` + `left/right arrow`</div>

## {#changing-tabs data-menu-title="Changing tabs"}

<div class = slide-title>`r fontawesome::fa("arrow-left", fill = "#05859B", a11y = "sem")` `r fontawesome::fa("arrow-right", fill = "#05859B", a11y = "sem")` Changing tabs</div>

## `r fontawesome::fa("apple", fill = "#053660", a11y = "sem")` Mac
:::: {.columns}
::: {.column width="50%"}
<br>

:::
::: {.column width="50%"}
<br>
<div class = body-text>`r fontawesome::fa("angle-right", fill = "#05859B", a11y = "sem")` Move tabs (to the right): `control` + `tab`</div>

<div class = body-text>`r fontawesome::fa("angle-right", fill = "#05859B", a11y = "sem")` Open a new tab (browser): `command` + `T`</div>   
:::
